column1: The [1] [1] [1] [1] (colloquially known as the [2] [2] and by its acronym [3]) is a bus terminal serving interstate buses traveling into Manhattan, New York City. The terminal is the largest in the Western Hemisphere and the busiest in the world by volume of traffic, serving about 8,000 buses and 225,000 people on an average weekday and more than 65 million people a year (page as of 2022).

column1: The early chatbot ELIZA's most famous script (which contained directives on how to act), DOCTOR, simulated a [1] psychotherapist (in particular, [2] [2], who was well known for simply parroting back at patients what they had just said).
